shortDescription: The tutor_answering_quiz_question/get_answer_by_id function pair from the Tutor LMS â€“ eLearning and online course solution WordPress plugin before 1.8.3 was vulnerable to UNION based SQL injection that could be exploited by students.
vulnerabilityName: themeum tutor_lms Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
